info.name: Feats
info.description: Optional Feats from The Tasty Lands of Silverplate

description.p: When you ingest a potion or poison, it leaves an aftertaste until you finish a long rest or consume another potion or poison. As a bonus action, you can use this aftertaste to be affected by the potion or poison that left the aftertaste once more, as if you consumed it again. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: When you ingest a potion or poison, it leaves an aftertaste until you finish a long rest or consume another potion or poison. As a bonus action, you can use this aftertaste to be affected by the potion or poison that left the aftertaste once more, as if you consumed it again.

description.p: The ingredients that form your body act as a poison for creatures that try to devour you. You have resistance against damage from bite attacks. Whenever a creature successfully makes a bite attack against you, devours you, or consumes you in any other way, it takes 1d10 poison damage.

Also, you can use a small portion of your body to create a poison. By spending 1 hour and dealing 5 necrotic damage to yourself, which can't be reduced by any means, you can extract a vial of poison. You can pour 1 vial of this poison on a weapon to coat it with the poison for 1 minute. For the duration, successful weapon attacks made with a weapon coated with this poison deal an extra 1d4 poison damage.A weapon can only be coated with one vial of this poison at a time. An extracted vial of poison expires after 1 day. Once you extract a vial of poison, you can't extract it again until you finish a long rest.

description.p: As you gain experience and live long enough to learn new recipes and encounter new tastes that you haven't tasted before, you can choose to enhance your own taste with extra flavors. You gain 12 points that you can spend to acquire new features from character tags (p. 6). When you gain this feature, you can choose from the pool of features from your already selected character tags, or select one or more new character tag(s) that areapplicable to your foodfolk character.

element.name: Cannibal
element.prerequisite: Perform cannibalism every week for a month

description.p: The foodfolk differ from ordinary consumables in their sentience and see such foods and beverages as what they are: nourishment. Yet, in a sense, they share the same nutritious flesh and blood. You are not bothered by consuming your peers, as you believe sentience is just a lie foodfolk tell themselves to feel superior. Your heinous cannibalistic beliefs grant you the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You only need to eat and drink once a week and you can sustain yourself by eating and drinking foodfolk.

If you deal damage to a creature with the Food or Beverage tag as a result of a successful unarmed strike, you can rip out a piece of the creature and eat or drink it using your reaction. If you do so, you regain a number of hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

description.p: Most foodfolk see cannibalism as an unacceptable crime. If you cannibalize foodfolk in front of others, they will probably become hostile towards you.

sheet.description: You only need to eat and drink once a week and you can sustain yourself by eating and drinking foodfolk. If you deal damage to a creature with the Food or Beverage tag as a result of a successful unarmed strike, you can rip out a piece of the creature and eat or drink it using your reaction. If you do so, you regain {{proficiency}} hit points

description.p: You've been burned a little too much. Your wounds have healed, but you are constantly aware that something inside you is carbonized. As an action, you can focus on the damage and the memory of your pain. When you do so, the carbonization spreads into a thin layer of hot charcoal on your skin for 1 minute. For the duration, you gain immunity to fire damage, but become vulnerable to bludgeoning damage. When the effect ends, you take 10 fire damage, which cannot be reduced by any means.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As an action, you can focus on the damage and the memory of your pain. When you do so, the carbonization spreads into a thin layer of hot charcoal on your skin for 1 minute. For the duration, you gain immunity to fire damage, but become vulnerable to bludgeoning damage. When the effect ends, you take 10 fire damage, which cannot be reduced by any means.

description.p: Something bit off a chunk of your body and the scar persisted even after medical care and healing magic. You carry it as a trophy and proof of your growth through harsh experiences. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you attack a creature, the target and its allies within 30 feet of you that can see or hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or become frightened of you for 1 minute. A creature frightened by this feature must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.
You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened. When you attack a creature, the target and its allies within 30 feet of you that can see or hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw DC {{chomped:dc}}. or become frightened of you for 1 minute. A creature frightened by this feature must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.

description.p: When you drop to O hit points after you take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, you do not fall unconscious; a piece of your body gets broken, chomped, or spilled instead. Your size becomes one category smaller than your regular size, and your speed decreases by 5 feet. You regain 15 hit points.
When you finish a long rest, your broken, chomped, or spilled parts are restored. You regain your regular size and speed.
Once you benefit from this feature, you must finish a long rest to benefit from it again.

sheet.description: When you drop to O hit points after you take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, you do not fall unconscious; a piece of your body gets broken, chomped, or spilled instead. Your size becomes one category smaller than your regular size, and your speed decreases by 5 feet. You regain 15 hit points. When you finish a long rest, your broken, chomped, or spilled parts are restored. You regain your regular size and speed.

description.p: Your body, in some cases a cup or a bowl, is tougher than normal, which provides you with additional natural protection. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
While you are not wearing armor, you have a +1 bonus to AC.
When you are dealt 10 or more damage, you can use your reaction to subtract ldl0 from it. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest to use it again.

sheet.description: While you are not wearing armor, you have a +1 bonus to AC. When you are dealt 10 or more damage, you can use your reaction to subtract ldl0 from it.

description.p: You have trained yourself to become faster in martial combat, both to deliver a faster killing blow and to escape one. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Whenever you drop to 0 hit points as a result of an attack, roll a d20. On a 20, you dodge the attack or endure the damage, dropping to 1 hit point instead.
Your speed increases by 15 feet.

sheet.description: Whenever you drop to 0 hit points as a result of an attack, roll a d20. On a 20, you dodge the attack or endure the damage, dropping to 1 hit point instead.

description.p: Over many battles you have endured and emerged victorious, slaying numerous enemies and glazing yourself with their blood. Your body is coated in a shiny color of your choice. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: When a creature within 5 feet of you touches you or hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to splash them with your glaze, dealing ld8 acid damage to the creature.
You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum one) every 10 minutes.
You have resistance against damage dealt by nonmagical projectiles.

sheet.description: When a creature within 5 feet of you touches you or hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to splash them with your glaze, dealing ld8 acid damage to the creature. You gain {{charisma:modifier}} temporary hit points every 10 minutes. You have resistance against damage dealt by nonmagical projectiles.

element.name: Great Chef
element.description:
You are a master in the kitchen and you can use kitchenware expertly. You gain the following benefits:
Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You gain proficiency in three weapons of your choice from the kitchen weaponry table (p. 143).
You gain proficiency with brewer's supplies and cook's utensils.

description.p: The fluids that you are composed of have a high rate of resistance against external forces that make you move. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws against being shoved or knocked prone.
You gain the benefits of the spider climb spell. This is not a magical effect.

sheet.description: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws against being shoved or knocked prone. You gain the benefits of the spider climb spell. This is not a magical effect.

description.p: You want more. You've acquired a taste for something that pleases you and you ache for more of it, be it power, excitement, or any other craving. You sharpen your skills, train your mind, and ready yourself for the challenges this path might put before you so that nothing can stop you from getting what you desire. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase an ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You become proficient in a skill of your choice.
At the end of each long rest, choose one condition. Until the end of your next long rest, you have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against the chosen condition.

sheet.description: At the end of each long rest, choose one condition. Until the end of your next long rest, you have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against the chosen condition.

description.p: You are excellent at throwing kitchen weaponry (p.143) that has the thrown property. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Your throwing range is doubled for these weapons.
You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with these weapons.

When you are making a weapon attack against a creature using these weapons, you can choose to throw them with a special technique. If you do so, the weapon is stuck in the creature on a hit. At the start of each of the creature's turns, while the weapon remains stuck, the creature takes ld6 necrotic damage. The creature can remove the weapon as a bonus action. The effects of this feature don't stack.

sheet.description: Your throwing range with kitchen weaponry with the thrown property is doubled and you have +1 to attack and damage rolls with them. When you are making a weapon attack against a creature using these weapons, you can choose to throw them with a special technique. If you do so, the weapon is stuck in the creature on a hit. At the start of each of the creature's turns, while the weapon remains stuck, the creature takes ld6 necrotic damage. The creature can remove the weapon as a bonus action. The effects of this feature don't stack.

description.p: You've had enough fights with the rotten and now you know how to track them down and identify them. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase an ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on attack rolls against the undead.
You can smell molded creatures within 30 feet of you. You can sense their directions, but you can't pinpoint their locations or understand their types and identities.

sheet.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against the undead. You can smell molded creatures within 30 feet of you. You can sense their directions, but you can't pinpoint their locations or understand their types and identities.

description.p: You are illed with healthy and organic ingredients. You gain the following beneits:

ul.li: Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Since your body is always healthy, you are immune to disease.
Whenever you regain hit points, you regain ld4 extra hit points.

sheet.description: You are immune to disease. Whenever you regain hit points, you regain ld4 extra hit points.

description.p: Your body is decorated with beautiful and colorful sprinkles. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: While you are not wearing armor, you have a +1 bonus to AC. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

You can use your bonus action to cast the color spray spell without expending a spell slot. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.
You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks against creatures without the Sweet tag.

sheet.description: While you are not wearing armor, you have a +1 bonus to AC. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit. You can use your bonus action to cast the color spray spell without expending a spell slot. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest. You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks against creatures without the Sweet tag.

description.p: Your flavor has played a part in your adventures, and you are good at connecting with others of similar taste. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You can communicate telepathically with creatures that have the same alignment as you within 30 feet, but you still need to share a language to be able to understand each other. A creature you communicate with in this way can also respond to you telepathically while within range.

sheet.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures that have the same alignment as you within 30 feet, but you still need to share a language to be able to understand each other. A creature you communicate with in this way can also respond to you telepathically while within range.

element.name: Splasher
element.prerequisite: Some sort of filling, suchas the jelly of a donut or the sauce(s) in lasagna

description.p: You are filled with delicious fillings. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: As an action, you can spill your fillings around you. A 10-foot-radius area centered on you becomes difficult terrain. You can move normally within this area as your own fillings don't affect you.

As an action, you can splash your fillings in a 15-foot cone originating from you. Each creature in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier) or take 2d4 necrotic damage.

description.p: You can use these benefits a total number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As an action, you can spill your fillings around you. A 10-foot-radius area centered on you becomes difficult terrain. You can move normally within this area as your own fillings don't affect you. As an action, you can splash your fillings in a 15-foot cone originating from you. Each creature in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw DC {{splasher:dc}} or take 2d4 necrotic damage.

description.p: You were cooked on the streets and know your way around people. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Wisdom or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks against humanoid creatures.
You gain proficiency with two of the following tools of your choice: cobbler's tools, disguise kit, forgery kit, one gaming set, or thieves' tools.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks against humanoid creatures.
